headline: Danaher beats Q4 expectations as bioprocessing business shows strength
summary: Investing.com -- Danaher Corporation (NYSE:DHR) reported fourth-quarter adjusted earnings per share of $2.23, exceeding analyst estimates of $2.14, while revenue reached $6.84 billion, surpassing the consensus expectation of $6.79 billion. The company’s revenue increased 4.5% YoY, with non-GAAP core revenue growing 2.5%.

headline: Danaher (NYSE:DHR) Posts Q4 CY2025 Sales In Line With Estimates
summary: Diversified science and technology company Danaher (NYSE:DHR) met Wall Streets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 4.6% year on year to $6.84 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.23 per share was 1.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Danaher: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: WASHINGTON (AP) — Danaher Corp. DHR) on Wednesday reported net income of $1.2 billion in its fourth quarter. On a per-share basis, the Washington-based company said it had net income of $1.68.
